---
name: Research Task
about: This template supports the creation and tracking of research tasks.
title: "[RESEARCH]"
labels: research
assignees: ''

---

# Definition of Ready

- [ ] **Clear Description**: The task has a concise title and description (1-2 sentences).
- [ ] **Objective Defined**: The goal is specific (e.g., "Investigate SLAM algorithms for visual navigation" or "Implement IMU data fusion").
- [ ] **Dependencies Identified**: Blockers or prerequisites are listed (e.g., hardware access, prior research).
- [ ] **Effort Estimate**: Rough estimate in hours (e.g., 2-4h for research, 4-8h for coding).

# Definition of Done

- [ ] **Findings Documented**: Key findings, limitations, and open questions are summarized in a shared document (e.g., Markdown/Notion).
- [ ] **Actionable Output**: Findings include clear next steps or recommendations for implementation/research.
- [ ] **Peer Review**: At least one team member has reviewed the findings for clarity and relevance.
- [ ] **Blockers Identified**: Any unknowns or dependencies are flagged for the next sprint planning.
